name: Trust – US
title: Trust – US
description: For those years with estimates from more than one poll, the reported figure corresponds to the average for that year.

sources.name: Trust – PEW Research Center (2017)
sources.additionalInfo: For those years with estimates from more than one poll, the reported figure corresponds to the average for that year.

fields.name: Trust in government (Pew Research Centre (2017))
fields.description: Percentage who trust the government in Washington always or most of the time.

fields.name: Interpersonal Trust (General Social Survey (GSS) (2016))
fields.description: Share of survey respondents responding to the question "Generally speaking, would you say that most people can be trusted or that you can't be too careful in dealing with people?" Available replies are "Can trust", "Cannot trust", "Depends" , "Don't Know" and "No answer".
